abstract: Toyota Motor continues on the journey to repair its reputation with a campaign using the theme “Ideas for good” that will seek suggestions from consumers. The campaign, to be introduced on Monday, invites consumers to come up with new ways to use five existing Toyota Motor technologies

lead_paragraph: Toyota Motor continues on the journey to repair its reputation with a campaign using the theme “Ideas for good,” which will seek suggestions from consumers.
